author: Simon Difford
description: Irish whiskey is often matured in oloroso sherry seasoned casks so it's no surprise that whiskey and sherry blend harmoniously in this cocktail, with lemon tartness balanced by rich red currant syrup, the key ingredient that makes this cocktail "Special".
name: Artist's Special Cocktail

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
